概要  パッケージ   クラス  使用  階層ツリー  非推奨 API  索引  ヘルプ 
 前のクラス   次のクラス フレームあり    フレームなし    
概要: 入れ子 | フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド 詳細: フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド

ow.routing
インタフェース RoutingServiceProvider

既知の実装クラスの一覧:
AbstractRoutingDriverProvider, IterativeRoutingDriverProvider, RecursiveRoutingDriverProvider
public interface RoutingServiceProvider

メソッドの概要
 RoutingServiceConfiguration getDefaultConfiguration()
          Return the default configuration for a routing service.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Return the name of an algorithm that this provider supports.
 RoutingService getService(RoutingServiceConfiguration config, MessagingProvider provider, MessageReceiver receiver, RoutingAlgorithmProvider algoProvider, RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration algoConfig)
          Return a routing service.
 RoutingService getService(RoutingServiceConfiguration config, MessagingProvider provider, MessageReceiver receiver, RoutingAlgorithmProvider algoProvider, RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration algoConfig, ID selfID)
          Return a routing service.
 

メソッドの詳細

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Return the name of an algorithm that this provider supports.

getDefaultConfiguration

RoutingServiceConfiguration getDefaultConfiguration()
Return the default configuration for a routing service.

getService

RoutingService getService(RoutingServiceConfiguration config,
                          MessagingProvider provider,
                          MessageReceiver receiver,
                          RoutingAlgorithmProvider algoProvider,
                          RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration algoConfig,
                          ID selfID)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Return a routing service.

パラメータ:
config - a configuration which getConfiguration() returned.
selfID - ID of this node, which cannot be null.
例外:
java.io.IOException

getService

RoutingService getService(RoutingServiceConfiguration config,
                          MessagingProvider provider,
                          MessageReceiver receiver,
                          RoutingAlgorithmProvider algoProvider,
                          RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration algoConfig)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Return a routing service. The ID of this node is determined based on the address of this node itself

パラメータ:
config - a configuration which getConfiguration() returned.
algoConfig - the length of an ID is derived by getIDSizeInByte() method of this instance.
例外:
java.io.IOException
